Forsaken Darohl

Once the singular metropolis of the advanced Darohl peoples, the solemn towers and gates hewn from the the rocks at the foothills of Zwo Kayan give little indication of damage once inflicted deep within by means of Soul Bombs wielded by the rival Graadien civilisation in what became known as the Arcane Holocaust.
